effects.display_string: Set: Your spells and abilities have a chance to activate a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of your Templar's Verdict and Divine Storm by 2% stacking up to 10 times. Spending Holy Power on damaging abilities has a 12% chance to remove Winning Streak!
(4) Set: When you lose your Winning Streak! you get the last Holy Power spent back, you cannot lose Holy Power for the next 4.0 sec, and the damage of your Holy Power abilities are increased by 10%.

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: The Jastor Diamond

spells.description: Equip: Take Credit for your allies' deeds up to once every 12 sec, gaining 79 of their highest secondary stat up to 10 times until shortly after leaving combat. You have a 10% chance to get caught in the act, transferring all accumulated Credit to your ally for 15 sec instead.

description: I'm not gonna give you a detailed receipt of all the businesses I took over, started, sold, or destroyed. I won: that's all. I won everything I wanted.

name: Mechano-Core Amplifier

spells.description: Equip: Your harmful abilities have a chance to power the amplifier, randomly increasing either your highest secondary stat by 3,148 or your lowest secondary stat by 3,972 for 10 sec.

description: Intended for machine use only. Use at your own risk.

spells.description:
Equip: Upon entering combat, and every 60 sec, gain either Massive or Miniature for 30 sec.

Miniature
Reduces your size by 20%, and increases your Speed by 1,204 and Haste by 8,068.

Massive
Increases your size by 20%, maximum health by 297,781, and Strength by 7,537.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Selfless Wings of the Ascended

spells.description:
Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
